[console_scripts]
kiara = kiara.interfaces.cli:cli

[kiara.metadata_schemas]
python_class = kiara.metadata.core_models:PythonClassMetadata

[kiara.modules]
metadata.python_class = kiara.modules.metadata:ExtractPythonClass
pipeline = kiara.pipeline.module:PipelineModule
value.hash = kiara.operations.calculate_hash:CalculateValueHashModule
value.load = kiara.modules.save_value:LoadValueModule
value.pretty_print = kiara.operations.pretty_print:PrettyPrintValueModule
value.save = kiara.modules.save_value:SaveValueModule

[kiara.operation_types]
all = kiara.operations:AllOperationType
calculate_hash = kiara.operations.calculate_hash:CalculateHashOperationType
convert = kiara.operations.type_convert:ConvertValueOperationType
extract_metadata = kiara.operations.extract_metadata:ExtractMetadataOperationType
import_file = kiara.operations.data_import:FileImportOperationType
import_file_bundle = kiara.operations.data_import:FileBundleImportOperationType
pretty_print = kiara.operations.pretty_print:PrettyPrintOperationType
sample = kiara.operations.sample:SampleValueOperationType
save_value = kiara.operations.save_value:SaveOperationType
serialize = kiara.operations.serialize:SerializeValueOperationType

[kiara.value_types]
any = kiara.data.types.core:AnyType
deserialize_config = kiara.data.types.core:DeserializeConfigData
load_config = kiara.data.types.core:LoadConfigData
value_info = kiara.data.types.core:ValueInfoData
value_lineage = kiara.data.types.core:ValueLineageData

[mkdocs.plugins]
frkl-docgen = kiara.doc:FrklDocumentationPlugin
